turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey X, I would like to try and order a coffee for the first time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, the nearest coffee location is, Starbucks location on 150 University Blvd in Morehead, would you like to order from there or chose another place.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like to other from there. How far is it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Its about 15 minutes drive from you. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to know what they have available.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: In their categories for Coffee Drinks they have, Cold Brew Iced coffee, Evolution Fresh, Bottled Drinks, Brewed Coffee, Espresso and Frappuccino. If would you like more information on each specific drink you can visit the link on your X app.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I know what I want actually, I am looking for a Nitro Cold

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, what size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Grande size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, is there anything else you would like to add to your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want also a Grande Caffee Misto for my wife

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, what kind of milk would you like to add for her?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to ad nonfat milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Is there anything else you wish to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nothing more.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your order is being process on the payment method on file.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: When can I pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order should be ready in about 5 minutes at 150 University Blvd in Morehead.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order is already process, you should be receiving a receipt via text shortly. Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Goodbye.
